Thank you to all of those who continued to support this work and believed in the right to medical aid in dying through this process. @DWDCanada has persevered, and will continue to move the dial on awareness of and choice in dying in Canada.

SO THRILLED to share @DWDCanada regained status as human rights charity w/ @CanRevAgency. Bravo staff, volunteers, @MillerThomson who pursued this recognition that our advocacy, education, support work is charitable. Retro to Jan. 2018, ppl who donated will receive a tax receipt.

Later, the Mom and Young Daughter discussing a project:
Young Daughter: “Then I’ll put some glitter on it. Everything is better when there is a little glitter.”
In summation: this girl is my new mentor.

OH #Toronto subway: Mom: “Oh dear. The train bumps might make me fall.” Young Daughter: “There are people around to help catch you.” Mom: “They might not be able to.” Young Daughter: “Then the floor will. It will always be there. You can’t keep falling forever.”

I guess having spent most of my childhood and teen years in a 5-pin bowling alley, eating cheesedogs and Fanta, has turned my tastebuds into utter trash. Bowling world excellence comes at a significant cost. No one talks about that. I'm here to tell you there is a dark side.
@Fancysez This is the cutest thing this Sunday has produced thus far.
@2ndLifeADog Thank you! I'm trying to maintain my anger but it's very dfficult due to the fact that he's a very nice adorable person.

Case in point: y'day my husband left me a "treat". I just saw "peanut butter" on the label, ate it whole in an embarrassingly small # of bites. Told him I ate it. His eyes got big, said, "Do you know what it was?" I did not. It was a power bar made of crickets. #LookBeforeYouEat

For me, this isn't just a costume, it's a reflection of my actual eating habits, akin to the Tiger Shark. I wouldn't be surprised if upon my death they found a license plate or old TV sets in my stomach. https://t.co/j3hVnpkJsC

@Galidar @anne_theriault I appreciate honest ?s! Can be simple as that, gendered, 1-sided nature adds to it. Tht wmn’s marital status is 1st thing ppl shld know abt, so aggravating. Supercedes all else. We can’t opt out of IDing as such. On my wedding invites I put “will remain Ms” to avoid Mrs. garbage.
@anne_theriault Same goes for the Mr. vs. Mrs. / Ms. / Miss thing. People need to respect how strongly women can feel about this. I get angrier at every form I see with this still on it.
